mapper.update:
update pr_product
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATER = #{record.updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DISABLE = #{record.disable,jdbcType=BIT},
START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SORT = #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=BIT},
EN_NAME = #{record.enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYWORDS = #{record.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THUMBNAIL = #{record.thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{record.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLOW_DISTRIBUTION = #{record.allowDistribution,jdbcType=BIT},
DISTRIBUTION_VALUE = #{record.distributionValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SHOP_ID = #{record.shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASING_COST = #{record.purchasingCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DIST_INTRUEDUTION = #{record.distIntruedution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOURP_SALE_PRICE = #{record.gourpSalePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
INDEPENDENT_PRICE = #{record.independentPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
NUMBER_COUNT = #{record.numberCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUDIT_DESCRIPTION = #{record.auditDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORAGE = #{record.storage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET_PRICE = #{record.marketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TRANSPORT_FEE = #{record.transportFee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CONTENT = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
EN_CONTENT = #{record.enContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

mapper.select: select prod.* from member mem LEFT JOIN member_product_distribution mpd ON mem.id = mpd.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN pr_product prod ON prod.id = mpd.PRODUCT_ID where mem.id= #{memberId}
